During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon [[Elegy for the End]] (Bow) and the 5-star weapon [[Skyward Blade]] (Sword) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During the event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons [[The Alley Flash]] (Sword) and [[Wine and Song]] (Catalyst) and the 4-star weapons [[Favonius Greatsword]] (Claymore), [[Favonius Warbow]] (Bow), and [[Dragon's Bane]] (Polearm) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
